subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: For 60 years, Eddie Feigner barnstormed the globe with his four-man softball team, hurling 100-mile-an-hour pitches that struck out Willie Mays and 141,516 other batters.
snippet: For 60 years, Eddie Feigner barnstormed the globe with his four-man softball team, hurling 100-mile-an-hour pitches that struck out Willie Mays and 141,516 other batters.
